sentences.en: A bandleader named Guy Lombardo helped make Auld Lang Syne a modern tradition.
sentences.cn: 乐队指挥盖伊·伦巴多协助将“美好的昔日”转化为现代风格.

sentences.en: Oil heiress Joan is going to elope with bandleader Allen whom she ? s known four days.
sentences.cn: 有趣的冤家喜剧,由詹姆斯.卡格尼和贝特. 戴维斯这对奇妙的组合主演.

sentences.en: The bandleader arrives with a preacher, but their marriage ( in California, not Nevada ) is not valid.
sentences.cn: 由于男女主角的性格鲜明强烈, 演对手戏时便撞激出耀眼的火花, 使两个很少演喜剧的大明星变得相当逗笑.

sentences.en: Their father was a bandleader and their mother taught harmony singing.
sentences.cn: 他们的父亲是伴舞乐队的指挥，他们的母亲教授合唱。

words.tran_cn: 乐队指挥；军乐队或管乐队首度

trans.tran_en: someone who  conduct s  a band, especially a dance or  jazz  band
